mapper.insert: insert into consoluser ( usernum, userid, userpwd, birthdate, username, email, tel1, tel2, tel3, imageurl ) VALUES ( rpad(ABS(dbms_random.random),2)||'-'||rpad(ABS(dbms_random.random),3)||'-'||rpad(ABS(dbms_random.random),4), #{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{birthdate}, #{username}, #{email}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}, #{imageurl} )
mapper.select: SELECT usernum, userid, userpwd, birthdate, username, email, tel1, tel2, tel3, imageurl, POINT, USERLEVEL FROM consoluser WHERE userid = #{userid} AND userpwd = #{userpwd}
